Uses of Projection in org.criteria4jpa.projection
 

Classes in org.criteria4jpa.projection that implement Projection
 class ConstructorProjection
          Class representing a constructor projection.
 class CountProjection
          Class representing a "count" projection.
 class DistinctProjection
          Class representing a "distinct" projection.
 class FunctionProjection
          Class representing projection based on a function.
 class PathProjection
          Simple class for all projections that refer to a persistent field or a single-valued relationship field using a path expression.
 class ProjectionList
          Simple class for projection lists that wrap other projections.
 class RootEntityProjection
          Simple projection that refers project to the entity of the root criteria of the criteria hierarchy.
 

Methods in org.criteria4jpa.projection that return Projection
static Projection Projections.absoluteGroupPath(String path)
           This projection can be used if you want the criteria to return a certain persistent field or a single-valued relationship field.
static Projection Projections.absolutePath(String path)
           This projection can be used if you want the criteria to return a certain persistent field or a single-valued relationship field.
static Projection Projections.avg(String relativePath)
          A projection that returns the average of all values.
static Projection Projections.distinct(Projection projection)
          Creates a "distinct" projection wrapping another projection.
static Projection Projections.distinctRootEntity()
           Returns a projection referring to the distinct root entities of the criteria hierarchy it is added to.
static Projection Projections.groupProperty(String relativePath)
          This method only exists for compatibility with the Hibernate Criteria API and simply delegates the call to Projections.relativeGroupPath(String).
static Projection Projections.max(String relativePath)
          A projection that returns the largest value of a persistent field.
static Projection Projections.min(String relativePath)
          A projection that returns the smallest value of a persistent field.
static Projection Projections.property(String relativePath)
          This method only exists for compatibility with the Hibernate Criteria API and simply delegates the call to Projections.relativePath(String).
static Projection Projections.relativeGroupPath(String path)
           This projection can be used if you want the criteria to return a certain persistent field or a single-valued relationship field.
static Projection Projections.relativePath(String path)
           This projection can be used if you want the criteria to return a certain persistent field or a single-valued relationship field.
static Projection Projections.rootEntity()
          Creates a projection referring to the root entity of the criteria hierarchy it is added to.
static Projection Projections.rowCount()
           Creates a count projection for the root entity of the criteria.
static Projection Projections.rowCountDistinct()
           Creates a "count distinct" projection for the root entity of the criteria.
static Projection Projections.sum(String relativePath)
          A projection that returns the sum of all values.
 

Methods in org.criteria4jpa.projection with parameters of type Projection
 ProjectionList ProjectionList.add(Projection projection)
          Adds another projection to the list of wrapped projections.
 ConstructorProjection ConstructorProjection.add(Projection projection)
          Adds another projection to the list of projections for this constructor projection.
static CountProjection Projections.count(Projection projection)
          Creates a count projection for the specified relative path.
static Projection Projections.distinct(Projection projection)
          Creates a "distinct" projection wrapping another projection.
